alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; San Francisco River Valley; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 12:40PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands, Northwest Plateau, San Francisco River Valley and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways along U.S. Highway 550.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; San Francisco River Valley; West Central Highlands
